text: Jab Allah Taalaa ney nabiyon say ehad liya kay jo kuch mein tumhen kitab-o-hikmat doon phir tumharay pass woh rasool aaye jo tumharay pass ki cheez ko sach bataye to tumharay liye uss per eman lana aur uss ki madad kerna zaroori hai. Farmaya kay tum iss kay iqrari ho aur iss per mera zimma ley rahey ho? Sab ney kaha humen iqrar hai farmaya to abb gawah raho aur khud mein bhi tumharay sath gawahon mein hun
